title: GoPro: HERO5 - Voice Control
description:
Take hands-free control of your GoPro using simple voice commands.

HERO5 cameras support the following commands:
•GoPro Start Recording
•GoPro HiLight
•That was sick 
•GoPro Stop Recording
•GoPro Take a Photo
•GoPro Shoot Burst
•GoPro Start Timelapse
•GoPro Stop Timelapse 
•GoPro Video Mode
•GoPro Photo Mode
•GoPro Timelapse Mode
•GoPro Burst Mode 
•GoPro Turn Off

As always, happy capturing! 

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of GoPro HERO5 Action Cameras with Voice Control. Shop for the full line of GoPro Action Cams at Abt today!

You might see examples of extreme use in this video. Please take appropriate precautions to ensure your own safety and the safety of those around you, and to protect your GoPro camera.
